content.text:
# Socialist Revolution Party of Benin

Socialist Revolution Party of Benin () was a Marxist-Leninist political party operating in Togo and Dahomey. It was founded in Cotonou on 28 July 1959. The party united Juvento dissidents from Togo and Dahomeyan trade unionists. The founding declaration of the party was signed by Max Mensah Aithson (Togo) and Théophile Béhanzin (Dahomey).
